00002 /*! clear vector */
00003 inline void dcovector::clear()
00004 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00005   l =0;
00006   cap =0;
00007   delete [] array;
00008   array =NULL;
00009 }

00011 //=============================================================================
00012 /*! make vector into zero vector */
00013 inline dcovector& dcovector::zero()
00014 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00015   for(long i=0; i<l; i++){ array[i] =0.0; }
00016   return *this;
00017 }

00019 //=============================================================================
00020 /*! change sign(+/-) of the vector */
00021 inline void dcovector::chsign()
00022 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00023   for(long i=0; i<l; i++){ array[i] =-array[i]; }
00024 }

00026 //=============================================================================
00027 /*! make a deep copy of the dcovector */
00028 inline void dcovector::copy(const dcovector& vec)
00029 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00030   l =vec.l;
00031   cap =vec.cap;
00032   delete [] array;
00033   array =new double[cap];
00034   dcopy_(vec.l, vec.array, 1, array, 1);
00035 }
00036 
00037 //=============================================================================
00038 /*! make a shallow copy of the vector\n
00039  This function is not desinged to be used in project codes. */
00040 inline void dcovector::shallow_copy(const _dcovector& vec)
00041 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00042   l =vec.l;
00043   cap =vec.cap;
00044   delete [] array;
00045   array =vec.array;
00046   
00047   vec.nullify();
00048 }
00049 
00050 //=============================================================================
00051 /*! make an alias of the vector\n
00052  Be carefull to use this function not to cause double free. */
00053 inline void dcovector::alias(const dcovector& vec)
00054 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00055   l =vec.l;
00056   cap =vec.cap;
00057   delete [] array;
00058   array =vec.array;
00059 }
00060 
00061 //=============================================================================
00062 /*! unalias the vector */
00063 inline void dcovector::unalias()
00064 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00065   l =0;
00066   cap =0;
00067   array =NULL;
00068 }

00070 //=============================================================================
00071 /*! resize vector */
00072 inline dcovector& dcovector::resize(const long& _l, const long margin)
00073 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00074 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00075   if( _l<0 ){
00076     ERROR_REPORT;
00077     std::cerr << "Vector size must be positive integers." << std::endl
00078               << "Your input was (" << _l << ", " << margin << ")." << std::endl;
00079     exit(1);
00080   }
00081 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00082   
00083   l =_l;
00084   cap =l+margin;
00085   delete [] array;
00086   array =new double[cap];
00087   
00088   return *this;
00089 }
00090 
00091 //=============================================================================
00092 /*! stretch or shrink vector */
00093 inline void dcovector::stretch(const long& dl)
00094 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00095 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00096   if( l+dl<0 ){
00097     ERROR_REPORT;
00098     std::cerr << "Vector size must be positive integers." << std::endl
00099               << "Your input was (" << dl << ")." << std::endl;
00100     exit(1);
00101   }
00102 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00103   
00104   //////// zero ////////
00105   if(dl==0){ return; }
00106   
00107   //////// non-zero ////////
00108   l +=dl;
00109   
00110   if(l>cap){
00111     while(l>cap){
00112       cap++;
00113       cap*=2;
00114     }
00115     double* newArray(new double[cap]);
00116     dcopy_(l-dl, array, 1, newArray, 1);
00117     delete [] array;
00118     array =newArray;
00119   }
00120 }
00121 
00122 //=============================================================================
00123 /*! swap two vectors */
00124 inline void swap(dcovector& u, dcovector& v)
00125 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00126   long u_cap(u.cap), u_l(u.l);
00127   double* u_array(u.array);
00128   u.l=v.l; u.cap=v.cap; u.array=v.array;
00129   v.l=u_l; v.cap=u_cap; v.array=u_array;
00130 }
00131 
00132 //=============================================================================
00133 /*! convert user object to smart-temporary object */
00134 inline _dcovector _(dcovector& vec)
00135 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00136   _dcovector newvec;
00137   
00138   //////// shallow copy ////////
00139   newvec.l =vec.l;
00140   newvec.cap =vec.cap;
00141   newvec.array =vec.array;
00142   
00143   //////// nullify ////////
00144   vec.l =0;
00145   vec.cap =0;
00146   vec.array =NULL;
00147   
00148   return newvec;
00149 }
